desc: Clotted blood taken from the body of Melord.

dictionary.lore: Clotted blood taken from the body of Melord. A mixture of disciple and demon blood, it shines with a characteristic indigo hue. The magical energy generated from the fusion of blood is still present even now, but the miasma seeping out of the clot indicates that it is badly corrupted. Research indicates that due to overwhelming physical stress, Melord was unable to maintain his form.

name: Demonblood Clot
